# Special Characters & Control Characters Test

This document tests handling of various special characters around citations.

## Zero-Width Characters

Citation with zero-width space: [​1​]
Citation with zero-width joiner: [‍2‍]
Citation with zero-width non-joiner: [‌3‌]

## Combining Characters

Citation with combining diacritics: [1̃], [2̂], [3̄]
Multiple combining: [1̈̃̂]

## Invisible Characters

Soft hyphen: [1­], [2­]
Word joiner: [1⁠], [2⁠]

## Quotation Marks Variations

Straight quotes: [1], "citation" [2]
Curly quotes: [1], "citation" [2], 'citation' [3]
Guillemets: «citation» [1], »citation« [2]
CJK quotes: 「citation」[1], 『citation』[2]

## Punctuation Variations

Ellipsis: citation...[1], citation…[2]
Em dash: citation—[1]
En dash: citation–[2]
Minus sign: citation−[3]

## Special Symbols

Copyright: ©[1]
Registered: ®[2]
Trademark: ™[3]
Degree: 100°[1]
Section: §[2]
Paragraph: ¶[3]

## Valid Citations
<!-- mdcitefix:refs -->
[1]: https://example.com/first
[2]: https://example.com/second
[3]: https://example.com/third
